text: In #Haiti & #SierraLeone, our ED Jon Lascher & strategic advisor @MohamedBailorB8 led historic #cholera #vaccination campaigns. How can lessons from those #vaccine movements apply to #COVID19? How can we debunk myths around vaccine hesitancy? Join us: https://t.co/tDOwqulvQj https://t.co/8LJDMpF584
